qoute: Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech.
A fair request should be followed by the deed in silence.
A man who lives right, and is right, has more power in his silence than another has by his words.
A note of music gains significance from the silence on either side.
Absolute silence leads to sadness. It is the image of death.
After silence that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.
And silence sounds no worse than cheers
And Silence, like a poultice, comes to heal the blows of sound.
But the child's sob curses deeper in the silence than the strong man in his wrath!
Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech.
A fair request should be followed by the deed in silence.
A man who lives right, and is right, has more power in his silence than another has by his words.
A note of music gains significance from the silence on either side.
Absolute silence leads to sadness. It is the image of death.
After silence that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.
And silence sounds no worse than cheers
And Silence, like a poultice, comes to heal the blows of sound.
But the child's sob curses deeper in the silence than the strong man in his wrath!
Calumnies are answered best with silence.
Confession is always weakness. The grave soul keeps its own secrets, and takes its own punishment in silence.
Darkness is to space what silence is to sound, i.e., the interval.
From politics it was an easy step to silence.
Great souls endure in silence.
He had occasional flashes of silence that made his conversation perfectly delightful.
He who does not understand your silence will probably not understand your words.
He who does not understand your silence will probably not understand your words.
He who sleeps in continual noise is wakened by silence.
I always believed that my silence on several topics will be an advantage in the long run.
I am rather inclined to silence.
I have been breaking silence these twenty-three years and have hardly made a rent in it.
I, schooled in misery, know many purifying rites, and I know where speech is proper and where silence.
If I cannot understand my friend's silence, I will never get to understand his words.
In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends
In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
It is a mistake to fancy that horror is associated inextricably with darkness, silence, and solitude.
It is more noble by silence to avoid an injury than by argument to overcome it.
It is tact that is golden, not silence.
It's very important in life to know when to shut up. You should not be afraid of silence.
My personal hobbies are reading, listening to music, and silence.
No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.
Only silence perfects silence.
Persuasive speech, and more persuasive sighs, Silence that spoke and eloquence of eyes.
Silence is a text easy to misread.
Silence is argument carried out by other means.
Silence is as deep as eternity, speech a shallow as time.
Silence is as full of potential wisdom and wit as the unshown marble of great sculpture.
Silence is foolish if we are wise, but wise if we are foolish.
Silence is more eloquent than words.
Silence is more eloquent than words.
Silence is not always tact, but it is tact that is golden, not silence.
Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.
Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
Silence is the element in which great things fashion themselves.
Silence is the most perfect expression of scorn.
Silence is the mother of truth.
Silence is the perfectos herald of joy. I were but little happy if I could say how much.
Silence is the safest course for any man to adopt who distrust himself.
Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
Silence is the true friend that never betrays.
Silence is the ultimate weapon of power.
Silence is the unbearable repartee.
Silence is the virtue of fools.
Silence is the wit of fools.
Silence may be golden, but can you think of a better way to entertain someone than to listen to him?
Since long I've held silence a remedy for harm.
Speech and silence. We feel safer with a madman who talks than with one who cannot open his mouth.
Speech is civilization itself. The word... preserves contact - it is silence which isolates.
Speech is human, silence is divine, yet also brutish and dead: therefore we must learn both arts.
Speech is of time, silence is of eternity.
Speech is the small change of silence.
Sticks and stones are hard on bones aimed with angry art. Words can sting like anything but silence breaks the heart.
Strength is born in the deep silence of long-suffering hearts; not amid joy.
That man's silence is wonderful to listen to.
The cruelest lies are often told in silence.
The eternal silence of these infinite spaces fills me with dread.
The eternal silence of these infinite spaces frightens me.
The holiest of all holidays are those
The man who does not understand your silence will probably not understand your words.
The most beautiful sound in the world is silence.
The only true criticism of high art is silence, silence as grand as heaven itself.
The rest is silence.
The silence that accepts merit as the most natural thing in the world is the highest applause.
Their silence is praise enough.
There is the silent criticism of silence, worth all the rest.
To a poet, silence is an acceptable response, even a flattering one.
To sin by silence when they should protest makes cowards of men.
True penitence condemns to silence. What a man is ready to recall he would be willing to repeat.
True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
We believe that the applause of silence is the only kind that counts.
Well-timed silence hath more eloquence than speech.
When little is done, little is said; silence is the mother of truth.
Where I am, I don't know, I'll never know, in the silence you don't know, you must go on, I can't go on, I'll go on.
Words can sting like anything, but silence breaks the heart.
Your hearts know in silence the secrets of the days and the nights.
